title: Tutorial Action Plan (TAPdis) Design for Supporting Students in Disability Translation and Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theories of translation and interpretation education, understanding of support systems for disabled learners
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based mobile learning environment for pre-service and in-service teachers. Strengthening practical competencies through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can develop over three types of translation and interpretation educational materials tailored to the linguistic needs of students with disabilities.
Learners can design over two customized learning strategies for different disability types (visual, auditory, physical disabilities, etc.).
Learners can plan and demonstrate at least one TAPdis execution procedure applicable to mobile environments in teams.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
